basics.name: Alex ( Allene )
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I have three launched mobile apps; the remainder of my profile is devoted to devOps and web application development. I would characterize myself as a full stack developer. I would rank JavaScript, Python, Typescript, and Mongoose as languages I am an expert in. I do enjoy back-end programming and creating modular functions or functions that reduce repetition for webhooks and APIs a little more than front-end programming. Most of my front-end experience is with react and react native.

work.summary: Crowd funding platform for your grandparents

work.summary: Social networking application that tracks users in real time
highlights: Web application, and mobile application for both iOS and Android
ReactJS, Express and NodeJs were just a few of the technologies used.
Uses Google Maps to track users in real time.
Developed the proprietary REST APIs used to interface with other APIs and applications.

volunteer.summary: Youth crisis line counselor, youth advocate
highlights: Provide crisis support for youth and parents
Teach trainees to provide support to youth in crisis
Volunteer IT / Tech, The Tech Dealer, CA Los Angeles, 2015-2019

awards.title: Youth Advocate 2009
awards.summary: Team leader for the Boys and Girls club of America, as well as the foster youth in Sacramento, CA. Lead crisis line counselor and lead crisis line trainer at California Coalition for Youth.

awards.title: Crisis Line Counselor
awards.summary: I was given the award at the assembly for youth in 2009.
